tool_description:
Welcome to our data API service on RapidAPI.com! We specialize in providing access to Amazon product discount code data, including product information, discount codes, expiration dates, and more. Our API allows users to retrieve this data based on time parameters, making it perfect for creating websites or mobile apps that offer money-saving services to shoppers.

With our API, developers can easily integrate our discount code data into their platforms, providing users with access to a wide r...
